short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Swagger Auto Server Selection by hostname

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Usage:
1. Install this extension.
2. Open a page with Swagger.
3. The extension will automatically select the server by hostname

Solved issue: https://github.com/swagger-api/swagger-ui/issues/4751
Source code: https://github.com/NikitaKorevo/swagger-auto-server-selection
